programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion

programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel

programme.title: The Medium
programme.desc: A shaman realizes that his nephew has been possessed. However, when unspeakable horrors start happening to his niece and to their town, the goddess that appears to have taken possession turns out not be as benevolent as it first appears.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugal’s diverse landscapes host unique wildlife. From Cork Oak forests in the south to deciduous forests in the north, follow iconic species through key life phases, from mating to survival in the wild.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Rivers are lifelines in Wild Portugal, connecting mountains to the sea. Discover the Deer stag, frogs' spring rituals, and Grebes' dances, along with other animals and landscapes along these vital waterways.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Portugal’s coastal waters and the Azores archipelago boast rich ecosystems. Explore the diverse species living in these waters and discover their unique lives in this revealing episode.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu Feildel has a dream to follow in the footsteps of Jules Vernes’ Around the World in 80 days. So Manu sets himself a challenge to circumnavigate the world, through his food loving eyes. Will he make it? First stop - London.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu arrives in Dubai after London and is quick to dig up as much culinary experience in Dubai so he sets off to the spice souk, fish markets and a local pastry kitchen.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Beyonce & Jay-Z: Power Love
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Examine the deaths linked to a world-famous axe murderer. Find out what really happened to Lizzie Bordon’s victims through newly uncovered evidence, 3D graphics, and a reenactment with a ballistic corpse.

programme.title: The Curious Life And Death Of...
programme.desc: Explore the mysterious death of musician and Rolling Stones founder Brian Jones. Was it the rock-and-roll lifestyle or foul play? See how new videotapes and a virtual autopsy bring light to a story that’s been painted black.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: In A 'Tale Of Two Sharks' we take a look at the incredible array of sharks found off the South African coast, focusing on the endangered Scalloped Hammerhead and the iconic Great White.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Farmer Tom's cabbages go missing, Pat-Pat thinks there must be a cabbage monster on the loose! Noddy's not so sure but then Driver Dylan tells Noddy he's just seen a monster! What if Pat Pat was right? Noddy investigates: where is the cabbage monster?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car
programme.desc: PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky doesnt know where his collection of sticks has gone until Pia realises Raa Raa took them by mistake.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and his friends are racing their vehicles through the Jingly Jangly Jungle but who will win

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: It’s Pandy’s birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him it’s even better – now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Indonesian famous models Patricia and Chika as they explore the city's hidden gems and vibrant scenes, immersing themselves in amazing contrasts and trendy vibes.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

Though diverse in outlook, they shared the belief that all Filipinos were brothers, whether they are Muslims or Christians, and hence, should not be at war with each other.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: The guys head to Orlando, where they are out of line with theme park guests, get wet on a river adventure and manage the (mis)information booth. Plus, the loser goes from spider hero to barnyard zero.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 12
programme.desc: Jesse wins a bin that turns out to include a giant pad for stuntmen to land on when they jump out of tall buildings. Meanwhile, Papa Bear wins a vintage 1970's British sportscar -but he can't fit into it!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5 13
programme.desc: The grand finale is an airport auction with giant hangars filled with cool stuff, including arcade games, lighting equipment, and a vintage El Camino. The most unlikely team-up yet occurs when Brandon and Lori join forces with Mone to win the final item of the day - a helicopter!

programme.title: Smallville S1 1
programme.desc: Teenager Clark Kent must cope with his emerging superpowers and his love for classmate Lana Lang. Clark befriends Lex Luthor and thwarts a vengeful former student.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 7
programme.desc: The President and First Lady host a tense dinner.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 3
programme.desc: Posing as a thrift store employee, Michael makes shoppers believe that a real waddling duck is just a lifelike decoy, and confuses clerks with a never-ending chain of hangers. Then, he convinces liquor store customers that some corks are made of cheese and a wine can freeze on command. Plus, in a museum he shocks a gullible new employee by destroying a priceless piece then impossibly reconstructing it.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 4
programme.desc: Michael convinces car wash patrons that he broke their window, only to miraculously fix it with the push of a button. Then, dry cleaning customers are confused when Michael is suddenly wearing their clothes in the blink of an eye. Plus, he has pet store shoppers convinced that they're seeing multiple fish in an empty water bowl.

programme.title: Fun and Games

programme.title: Buster Has a Wobbly Tooth!
programme.desc: Buster has a wobbly tooth! He gets it after being hit with a football & he & his friends race to the dentist.

programme.title: Jordie's Bed is Alive!
programme.desc: A series of magical items are coming to life across the city, starting with Jordie's bed! Mila & Morphle must also catch a wild magic carpet.

programme.title: Clawed Away
programme.desc: Mysterious flying objects cause chaos! Mila & Morphle must stop a UFO with a giant claw while also dealing with Orphle's troublesome magic cloud.

programme.title: Farming Sing Along
programme.desc: It's a farming sing-along! Learn your ABCs, do the five senses shakedown & go stargazing with Grandma Mei.

programme.title: Singing Fun!
programme.desc: It's time for singing fun! Learn your ABCs, wash your hands before you eat & get ready for a sleepover at Grandma Mei's house.

programme.title: Pumpkin Munch Mayhem
programme.desc: It's pumpkin munch mayhem! A hungry Wrigglepillar wants to eat Newt's giant pumpkin & Bubbles cheats in a football game.

programme.title: Pedal Power
programme.desc: It's time for some pedal power! Newt & her friends go on a bike adventure, Pogo learns to be patient & Jeff gets a messy houseguest.

programme.title: Fun times with JJ!
programme.desc: It's a playdate with JJ! Join him for a day of classic games & songs.

programme.title: Giggles & Fun!
programme.desc: Get ready for giggles & fun! Boba pretends to be a tickly caterpillar, the friends have a disco dance-off & Wally the Wolf plays firefighter.

programme.title: JJ's Animal Friends!
programme.desc: Join JJ on a musical field trip! He's visiting the farm to sing with the cows & sheep, & meeting all sorts of amazing animal friends.

programme.title: Winner
programme.desc: Who will be the winner? Newt is desperate to win a gold star in the gym challenges & Lulu wants to be first in line at the funfair.

programme.title: Spoilsport Spider
programme.desc: Don't be a spoilsport! Fuse is scared of a spider in his gym, Jeff & Bubbles can't play together & Bubbles spoils Pogo's magic show.

programme.title: Learning and Fun!
programme.desc: It's a day of learning & fun! The team rescues Scout from a hole, learns about mixing colors & saves a baby lion from the Bandit Bus.

programme.title: Let's Build!
programme.desc: Let's build! The construction crew builds a pancake shack for a sick friend, a new pond for the town & a big Ferris wheel at the fairground.

programme.title: ABC's and Counting
programme.desc: Learn your ABCs & how to count! The family sings the alphabet song, counts to ten with dinosaurs & learns about big & small.

programme.title: Important Jobs
programme.desc: Learn about important jobs! The twins become doctors, police officers & firefighters & they even get to be construction workers for a day.

programme.title: Evening Sing Along Fun!
programme.desc: It's evening sing-along fun! The family finds five little ducks, helps Itsy Bitsy Spider get home & learns that it's okay to have a healthy snack.

programme.title: Bedtime Songs With JJ
programme.desc: The sun is setting, & it’s time for bed. Follow JJ’s calming evening routine as he gets ready to drift off to sleep.

programme.title: The World - Episode 161
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Johnson Raela presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 32
programme.desc: Coming to you from the Situation Room, John Barron and Chas Licciardello cut through the spin as they discuss the people, policies and politics from the week in Donald Trump's second term in the White House.

programme.title: Australian Volleyball Super League - Round 4 Men's: Brisbane v Canberra Highlights
programme.desc: Six state teams in the Australian Volleyball Super League battle it out for the 2025 title. On Mondays catch the men's teams on court, then on Wednesdays, the women's teams go head to head as every point counts.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - King Island, TAS
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke meets a King Islander returning home to one of Australia's most remote and weatherbeaten outposts to reclaim and restore a derelict farmhouse.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 1
programme.desc: Thanh visits the biggest mushroom farm in Australia and compares their produce to wild foraged pine mushrooms, all to be enjoyed using an unconventional cooking approach.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 205
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 205

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: No. 82 Haunted House
programme.desc: The eldest son of the Mu family dies suddenly on the eve of his wedding. To rest his soul, a maid Xiao Die is made to marry and then buried alive with him. Since then, Mu's house is haunted by a series of terrifying incidents, and the family's secrets are gradually unveiled when Mu’s youngest daughter return home from abroad with her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: Two disrespectful and unruly students act out during their teacher, Mr Gale’s class. Unable to tolerate their behaviour, Mr Gale decides to take the two boys hostage and teach them a lesson that they will never forget.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: Anatomy Of A Crime
programme.desc: 202 people are killed when three bombs planted by Jemaah Islamiyah terrorists explode at the height of Bali's tourist season.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: The Rifkin Murders
programme.desc: Joel Rifkin is providing clues to New York State Police in order to identify two of his 17 victims that remain nameless. Peter Reiss follows up with his own on-camera sit-down with Rifkin to get answers.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: The Sheriff's Office in DeRidder, Louisiana, receives a distressing phone call from the owner of Dee's Motel. The man tells them that he's found a woman dead in room 6.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, two brothers are murdered in their sleep. Detectives suspect they were betrayed by someone they knew.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Curtis Reeves stands accused of murdering Chad Oulson over popcorn at a matinee movie. The defence claims he acted in self-defence—that Oulson was the aggressor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When Pam Shelly, 31, is found in her Cuero, Texas, bathroom with a fatal gunshot wound to the head, her death is initially ruled a suicide.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When a city official is gunned down in Berryville, shocked residents are left wondering who among them is a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: August 29, 2006, Riverside County, CA. Deputies from the Riverside County Sheriff's Department respond to the scene of an abandoned vehicle in a remote area of the Gavilan Hills.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: A violent argument between two men erupts at a busy grocery store. One is shot dead and the other faces a murder charge. With the whole incident caught on CCTV, who will the jury believe was the aggressor?

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Small-town detectives are frightened by what may come next after a young girl is brutally murdered in the woods; with a chance encounter and a digital trail, they must catch the child murderer at large.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A hyped-up man goes toe-to-toe with police; a woman flips off fellow drivers while dancing in the street; a pilot is arrested for allegedly stealing a plane; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a naked man makes a scene on a Miami Beach; a drunk driver finds a strange and dangerous place to relieve himself; and more!

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the body of free-spirited Bonnie Ruphard, 47, is spotted by a runner in Lafayette, LA, police suspect domestic violence.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: A young, pregnant woman is found dead of an apparent suicide in Saginaw, MI, but her family and friends don't believe it. The police discover a shocking secret they never saw coming.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Gagay: Prinsesa ng Brownout
programme.desc: Gagay's family collects wood and turns it into charcoal for profit. They become millionaires when they invent a coal-powered generator. Soon, they discover that money isn't everything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 35
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
